name: Graphical Management Kit (GMKT)
short_description: A single GUI that can be used to locally or remotely administer multiple systems, with potentially different OS. The software will attempt to minimize overheads. It will provide an interface for new applications/utilities to be seamlessly integrated.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: System Administrators
Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All POSIX (Linux/BSD/UNIX-like OSes)
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All BSD Platforms (FreeBSD/NetBSD/OpenBSD/Apple Mac OS X)
os.fullname: All BSD Platforms (FreeBSD/NetBSD/OpenBSD/Apple Mac OS X)

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All 32-bit MS Windows (95/98/NT/2000/XP)
